entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enhance Navigation works horribly, I would suggest drop it all and re do it again. #54982
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #54981
  • Perf improvement: json, mapaction #54980
  • ASP.NET Core publishes all the dll dependenies under the root directory #54979
  • Minimal APIs and controllers treat header arrays differently #54978
  • Support Token Credential Utilities for .http Files #54977
  • Should IHtmlAsyncContent.WriteToAsync use a custom encoder? #54976
  • JwtSecurityToken does not parse the payload claims correctly. Claims are missing in the Payload array. #54975
  • How to inject multiple Background services in Net8? #54972
  • How set Cookie and Session Timeout Based on Logged In User #54966
  • Setting Microsoft-related logs messages to "Information" or lower in appsetting.json causing an ASP.NET web application to stop serving page. Kestrel Web Server #54964
  • Random NullReferenceException on HttpContext.User Kestrel/Outofprocess #54962
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, plaintext #54961
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #54960
  • Issue with 1Password Extension Causing High CPU Usage in Blazor WebAssembly Application with OIDC Authentication #54959
  • How to res the username and pass #54957

Closed

  • Blazor Localization does not work with InteractiveServer #53707
  • Continuous browser reloading while navigating within AuthorizeView razor page #52686
  • Use SearchValues throughout dotnet/aspnetcore #46484
    .NET 9 Planning
  • API Proposal: Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery #53715
  • restore.cmd not working #54938
  • Net7 regression: Kestrel HttpRequestHeaders doesn't enumerate "Content-Length" unless there's another known header also present. #54557
  • Issue while converting .net 6 to .net 8 for IHttpContextAccessor. #54958
  • Incorrect documentation for Html.HiddenFor: `Html.HiddenFor` will never use `value` property from `htmlAttributes` to assign value #49415
    Backlog
  • MSAL on Blazor WebAssembly refresh token expiration invalid_grant regression #48264
  • Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.OpenIdConnect OpenIdConnectConfigurationSerializer Read() method does not parse UseInfoEndpoint correctly #54951
  • X509SecurityKey could support ECDSA backed Certificates for JsonWebToken signing #54963
  • Blazor Web App with Microsoft Entra External ID Exhibits Inconsistent Unauthorized Access Behavior #52856
  • Containerizing .NET 8 Blazor WASM breaks after update from .NET 6 #54618
  • Issue with Failed to load resource: net::ERR_HTTP2_PROTOCOL_ERROR #54559
  • Unhandled exception: When using popup components on an InteractiveServer page and navigating to any other InteractiveServer page #54731
  • Cannot create a new Blazor(Razor Component) inside a sub folder. ( this works in .NET 8) #54726
  • Virtualize component doesn't work with hidden elements #54741

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Skip SpotBugs for now #54986
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Skip SpotBugs for now #54985
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor/Web.JS] Add Circuit Handler Notification on Circuit Disconnect #54973
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Include a warning about port spoofing in xml #54971
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-routing
  • Improve documentation for CookiePolicyMiddleware and CookieOptions #54968
    community-contribution, area-middleware, 9.0-preview4

Merged

  • Quarantine CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #54937
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4
  • Use SearchValues throughout dotnet/aspnetcore (part 3) #54878
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `eff443c` to `0af9766` #54969
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • [release/8.0] Skip SpotBugs for now #54952
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.5
  • Include ContentLength when enumerating HttpHeaders #54760
    area-networking, 9.0-preview4
  • Docs: changed to align with function behaviour. #54965
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-ui-rendering, 9.0-preview4
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp testing deps #54947
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add APIs for OpenAPI document transformers #54935
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Static pages amid global interactivity #54948
    area-blazor
  • Add ShortCircuitAttribute #52571
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Quarantine CanResetSharedKey #54841
    area-identity, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add custom message to NavigationException #54862
    area-blazor, community-contribution
